minimize.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to reduce something that is difficult, dangerous, or unpleasant to the smallest possible amount or degree
minimize.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Every effort is being made to minimize civilian casualties.
The rail company is bringing in more trains in an effort to minimize disruption to travellers.
minimize.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to make something seem less serious or important than it really is
minimize.translation[0].definitions[1].e: We must not minimize the problem of racial discrimination.
minimize.translation[0].definitions[2].d: to make a document or program on your computer very small when you are not using it but still want to keep it open
minimize.translation[0].definitions[2].e: Click on the top of the window to minimize it.
minimize.translation[1].definitions[0].d: to make something as small as possible
minimize.translation[1].definitions[0].e: Investing in unit trusts minimises the risks if stock markets fall.
We need to minimize our transport costs.
minimize.translation[1].definitions[1].d: to make a WINDOW on a computer screen as small as possible
minimize.translation[1].definitions[1].e: Click on the small square to minimise the window.
